text: Now in the first [strongs id="h0259" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of Cyrus [strongs id="h3566" /] king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Persia [strongs id="h6539" /], that the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] by the mouth [strongs id="h6310" /] of Jeremiah [strongs id="h3414" /] might be fulfilled [strongs id="h3615" tvm="8800" /], the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] stirred up [strongs id="h5782" tvm="8689" /] the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of Cyrus [strongs id="h3566" /] king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Persia [strongs id="h6539" /], that he made a proclamation [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8686" /] [strongs id="h6963" /] throughout all his kingdom [strongs id="h4438" /], and [put it] also in writing [strongs id="h4385" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],
